list_definition.mean_english: sự ngạc nhiên, sự bất ngờ
list_definition.definition: (the feeling caused by) something sudden or unexpected

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Your letter was a pleasant surprise
There were some nasty surprises waiting for her when she returned
He stared at her in surprise
To my surprise the door was unlocked
(also adjective) He paid them a surprise visit.

list_definition.mean_english: làm ngạc nhiên, làm kinh ngạc
bất thình lình đẩy đến chỗ
list_definition.definition: to lead, by means of surprise, into doing something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her sudden question surprised him into betraying himself.

list_definition.definition: to find, come upon, or attack, without warning

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They surprised the enemy from the rear.

list_ex_of_english: The man appears flattered by her interest, but at the same time surprised by her aggressiveness.
